title: Compilation error on GCC 4.8
body_html:
Hi,

using GCC 4.8 the compilation of pytorch fails due to a unrecognized -Wdate-time option:

-- Building with NumPy bindings
-- Not using cuDNN
-- Not using CUDA
-- Not using NCCL
-- Building with distributed package 
-- Not using NNPACK
building 'torch._C' extension
gcc-4.8 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fstack-protector -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8 -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/csrc -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc-4.8 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fstack-protector -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8 -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/csrc -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/Storage.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/Storage.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc-4.8: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wdate-time’

This option was added in GCC 4.9, see release notes here.
body_text:
Hi,
using GCC 4.8 the compilation of pytorch fails due to a unrecognized -Wdate-time option:
-- Building with NumPy bindings
-- Not using cuDNN
-- Not using CUDA
-- Not using NCCL
-- Building with distributed package 
-- Not using NNPACK
building 'torch._C' extension
gcc-4.8 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fstack-protector -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8 -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/csrc -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc-4.8 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fstack-protector -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8 -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/csrc -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/Storage.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/Storage.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc-4.8: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wdate-time’
This option was added in GCC 4.9, see release notes here.
body:
Hi,

using GCC 4.8 the compilation of `pytorch` fails due to a unrecognized `-Wdate-time` option:

```bash
-- Building with NumPy bindings
-- Not using cuDNN
-- Not using CUDA
-- Not using NCCL
-- Building with distributed package 
-- Not using NNPACK
building 'torch._C' extension
gcc-4.8 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fstack-protector -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8 -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/csrc -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc-4.8 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fstack-protector -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8 -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/csrc -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/sch/schweter/Repositories/pytorch-gcc4.8/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/Storage.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/Storage.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc-4.8: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wdate-time’
```

This option was added in GCC 4.9, see release notes [here](https://gcc.gnu.org/gcc-4.9/changes.html).
